oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Dedication Chickamauga National Park, Chattanooga, Tenn. Sept. 18, 19, 20, 1863-1895
Chickamauga Dedication Ribbon
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: White silk lapel ribbon printed with images of crossed Confederate and Union flags and clasped hands.
This souvenir ribbon commemorates the dedication of Chickamauga National Park over a period of three days, September 18, 19, and 20, 1895.

The Persistence of Memory
